Title: It's Probably Nothing
Description:
You found a buzz orb! 

...Er, that's what the niffen call it. I just kind of went with it. 

It's still in a good condition. Still buzzing, humming, and warm to the touch! I haven't seen one since we were in Zaralek Cavern!

$n, you should see if we can get it to work. I will stand back here, just in case it is, um, not friendly. 

Nothing to worry about, I'm sure.
CompletionText: Yes, yes! It will be very exciting to hear what you have discovered.
RewardText:
Alpha site? Defense grid?

I don't like the sound of that.

We should get going. I don't want to be here if its friends come back with it.

That's not a reunion party I want to be a part of.

Hopefully it won't hone in on Tharessa... Nah, probably not. Anyway, we should get going. Like now.

Catch you later, $n. Thanks for your... um, help? I guess?
